hero.title: Reliable Functional Ingredients, Built for Scale
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for high-quality nutraceutical ingredients. U.S.-based operations, global sourcing expertise, and supply chain you can count on.

painPoints.title: We Understand Your Challenges
painPoints.subtitle: Sourcing ingredients internationally comes with real obstacles. We built Omni to solve them.

0.title: Inconsistent Quality
0.description: Supply uncertainty and quality variations across batches create formulation challenges and risk.

1.title: Long Lead Times
1.description: Extended timelines and customs complexity delay product launches and inventory planning.

2.title: Fragmented Logistics
2.description: Unclear responsibilities across international touchpoints lead to delays and miscommunication.

3.title: Communication Overhead
3.description: Excessive coordination costs across time zones and multiple vendors drain resources.

solutions.title: How Omni Simplifies Your Supply Chain
solutions.subtitle: We combine international sourcing expertise with U.S.-based operations to deliver ingredients reliably, transparently, and at scale.

0.title: U.S.-Based Operations
0.description: Local warehousing and fulfillment from strategic locations across North America.

1.title: Qualified Partnerships
1.description: Long-term relationships with vetted, cGMP-compliant manufacturers.

2.title: End-to-End Logistics
2.description: Complete international trade execution from origin to your door.

3.title: Documented Quality
3.description: Traceable systems with batch-level COAs and full documentation.

aboutPreview.description2: Backed by R&D capabilities from our parent group, we bring technical depth and supply chain expertise to every partnership.

story.title: Connecting Global Ingredients to North American Markets
story.description1: Omni Ingredients is a U.S.-based ingredient solutions company specializing in the sourcing, distribution, and commercialization of high-quality functional ingredients for the nutraceutical, food & beverage, and health industries.
story.description2: Built on a strong cross-border supply chain foundation, we connect global manufacturers with North American customers, providing reliable, compliant, and scalable ingredient solutions.
story.description3: Our parent group brings R&D capabilities and technical depth that sets us apart from traditional trading companies. We're not just moving products – we're building partnerships that drive innovation in health and wellness.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Omni Ingredients. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using the Omni Ingredients website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of our services following any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes. We encourage you to review these terms periodically.

useOfServices.title: Use of Services
useOfServices.intro: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You agree not to:
items: Use our services in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
Engage in any conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use of our services
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks
Use any automated means to access our website without permission
Transmit any malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation

orderAcceptance.title: Order Acceptance
orderAcceptance.content: All orders are subject to acceptance by Omni Ingredients. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including but not limited to product availability, errors in pricing or product information, or suspected fraud.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Prices are subject to change without notice. We make every effort to ensure pricing accuracy, but errors may occur. In the event of a pricing error, we will notify you and provide the option to proceed with the corrected price or cancel the order.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Payment terms are established on a per-customer basis. Standard terms may include net 30 days for approved accounts. We reserve the right to modify payment terms at our discretion.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Omni Ingredients or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws.
items: Reproduce, distribute, or display any content without prior written consent
Modify or create derivative works based on our content
Use our trademarks or logos without express permission
Remove any copyright or proprietary notices from our materials

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content1: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Omni Ingredients shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of our services.
limitationOfLiability.content2: Our total liability for any claim arising from these terms or our services shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific products or services giving rise to the claim.
limitationOfLiability.content3: This limitation applies regardless of the legal theory upon which the claim is based, including negligence, breach of contract, or any other theory.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content1: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governingLaw.content2: Any dispute arising from these terms shall be resolved exclusively in the state or federal courts located in California. You consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Omni Ingredients, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or engage with our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.intro: We may collect the following types of information:

personal.title: Personal Information
items: Name, email address, phone number, and company name
Information provided when you request quotes or samples
Communication records when you contact us

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Pages visited and time spent on our website

howWeUse.title: How We Use Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Process and fulfill your orders and requests
Respond to inquiries and provide customer support
Send relevant product information and industry updates
Prevent fraudulent transactions and protect our business

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
items: Service Providers: Third-party vendors who assist in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you
Business Partners: Trusted partners involved in fulfilling your orders or providing services
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
Business Transfers: In connection with any merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:
items: Encryption of sensitive data during transmission
Access controls limiting who can view your information
dataSecurity.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
items: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
Portability: Request your data in a portable format
yourRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Omni Ingredients uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control our use of them.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content1: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
whatAreCookies.content2: Cookies set by the website owner (in this case, Omni Ingredients) are called "first-party cookies." Cookies set by parties other than the website owner are called "third-party cookies." Third-party cookies enable third-party features or functionality to be provided on or through the website.

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences or filling in forms.

performance.name: Performance Cookies
performance.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us know which pages are the most and least popular.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant advertisements on other sites.

howToManage.title: How to Manage Cookies
howToManage.intro: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie preferences in the following ways:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience.

browsers.title: Popular browser cookie settings:
browsers.chrome: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
browsers.edge: Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

optOut.title: Opt-Out Links
optOut.content: Some third-party services provide opt-out mechanisms. For example, you can opt out of Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: We may use third-party services that set cookies on our website. These services include:
items: Google Analytics: For website traffic analysis and reporting
Social Media Platforms: For sharing functionality and embedded content
Customer Support Tools: For live chat and support features
thirdParty.disclaimer: We do not control the cookies used by these third parties. Please review their respective privacy policies for more information about their cookie practices.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please revisit this page regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

hero.title: Press & Media
hero.description: News, announcements, and resources for media professionals covering the nutraceutical industry.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description1: Omni Ingredients is a U.S.-based ingredient solutions company specializing in the sourcing, distribution, and commercialization of high-quality functional ingredients for the nutraceutical, food & beverage, and health industries.
overview.description2: With a strong cross-border supply chain foundation and U.S.-based operations, we connect global manufacturers with North American customers, providing reliable, compliant, and scalable ingredient solutions.
overview.description3: Our parent group's R&D capabilities and technical expertise set us apart from traditional trading companies, enabling us to offer formulation guidance and innovative solutions to our partners.

mediaContact.title: Media Contact
mediaContact.inquiryInfo: For press inquiries, interview requests, or media kit access, please contact our team directly.

hero.title: Sustainability
hero.description: Building a responsible supply chain that benefits people, communities, and the planet while delivering exceptional quality.

mission.title: Our Sustainability Mission
mission.description: At Omni Ingredients, we believe that sustainable business practices and quality ingredients go hand in hand. We are committed to building transparent, ethical supply chains that create value for all stakeholders while minimizing environmental impact.

responsibleSourcing.title: Responsible Sourcing
responsibleSourcing.description: We partner with suppliers who share our commitment to ethical practices, ensuring ingredients are sourced responsibly and sustainably.

supplyChainTransparency.title: Supply Chain Transparency
supplyChainTransparency.description: Complete visibility into our supply chain, from raw material origins to final delivery, ensuring accountability at every step.

environmentalPractices.title: Environmental Practices
environmentalPractices.description: Minimizing our environmental footprint through efficient operations, reduced waste, and sustainable packaging solutions.

communityImpact.title: Community Impact
communityImpact.description: Supporting the communities where we operate and source ingredients, creating positive social and economic impact.

supplierAudits.label: Supplier Audits
supplierAudits.description: All key suppliers undergo regular compliance audits

zeroTolerance.label: Tolerance Policy
zeroTolerance.description: Zero tolerance for unethical sourcing practices

future.title: Looking Ahead
future.description: Sustainability is a journey, not a destination. We continuously evaluate and improve our practices, setting ambitious goals for carbon reduction, waste elimination, and community impact. Our commitment to transparency means we'll share our progress openly with our partners and stakeholders.

carbonNeutrality.title: Carbon Neutrality
carbonNeutrality.description: Working toward carbon-neutral operations across our supply chain

packagingInnovation.title: Packaging Innovation
packagingInnovation.description: Developing sustainable packaging solutions with reduced environmental impact

supplierDevelopment.title: Supplier Development
supplierDevelopment.description: Partnering with suppliers to improve their sustainability practices

circularEconomy.title: Circular Economy
circularEconomy.description: Exploring closed-loop systems for waste reduction and resource recovery

cta.title: Partner With Purpose
cta.description: Join us in building a more sustainable future for the ingredients industry. We're always looking for partners who share our values.
